Articles.Content: I have to admit there was one of the few games that does not have mod packs... when I first found RSS I thought it might be a mod pack.... kind of surprised it was not since many of the mods it needs are made by nat
I do hope Nathan picks it up. The sheer amount of mods and "overwrite this" "Delete that" is confusing.

Jamis I used your mod bundler a lot and it is a blessing for all those that got a little confused in the hash that is the install procedure for Real Solar System. Thank you for the work you did, even though you have to end it. I'm hopeing your work inspired some future modders that might tackle those problems.
My attempt at RSS mod-packing skillz

If no one else steps up I'll try to at least keep it current with my stuff--it's a wonderful tool and has saved me a ton of tech-support time, since installation is the #1 issue people have.

Wow, you want to work on ANOTHER mod? WHEN DO YOU SLEEP?????

My attempt at RSS mod-packing skillz

http://i.imgur.com/3qGNpVo.jpg

IÃ‚Â´m sorry, but that is kinda funny
I can definitely see how this would be difficult to maintain. The difficulty of getting everything installed and configured is why I use it in the first place!

Wow, you want to work on ANOTHER mod? WHEN DO YOU SLEEP?????

IÃ‚Â´m sorry, but that is kinda funny

It is.

Ah well, I'll just have to wait until nathan or someone else picks it up so I can flyby Jupiter and crash into pluto

Heh, I *don't* particularly want to work on another mod, and I don't get enough sleep.

OtherBarry (who has thankfully stepped up to maintain the manifest and handle tech support on this thread) and I will have something for you before too long.

Heh, I *don't* particularly want to work on another mod, and I don't get enough sleep.

OtherBarry (who has thankfully stepped up to maintain the manifest and handle tech support on this thread) and I will have something for you before too long.

No wonder, that you don't get enough sleep, NathanKell... I am amazed, that you get ANY sleep!

But it's good to hear, that this is being worked on!

Keep on rocking!

Edited May 6, 2014 by BadRocketsCo.

is it stil working ?

Theoretically, yes it still works, however, it's manifest hasn't been updated in about a month, so depending on where they've been hosted and how much they've been updated, some mods will work fine, some mods will download old versions, and some mods won't work at all.

I'm in the process of updating it, but I've been fairly busy recently, so it might be a little while. If all goes to plan, it'll be ready by the scheduled forum downtime, and then I'll test it over those few days and then start a new thread once the forums are back up.

However, I'll only be updating the manifest files, any work needing to be done to the bundler itself will probably not happen, or at least not for a while.
